name: logtrade
description: A personal journal for keeping track of all your trades quickly

scripts.build:dev: npm run build:clean && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development --watch
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:clean && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.open:dev: npm run build:clean && concurrently "npm run build:dev" "npx live-server --port=1234 --open=dist/ --watch=dist/"
scripts.open:prod: npm run build:clean && concurrently "npm run build:prod" "npx live-server --port=1234 --open=dist/"
